tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file at the specified path

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: Read a text file and return its contents as string

tools.name: read_binary_file
tools.description: Read a binary file and return raw bytes

tools.name: read_json_file
tools.description: Read and parse a JSON file into an object

tools.name: read_yaml_file
tools.description: Read and parse a YAML configuration file

tools.name: read_xml_file
tools.description: Read and parse an XML document

tools.name: read_csv_file
tools.description: Read a CSV file into structured data

tools.name: read_file_lines
tools.description: Read file and return as array of lines

tools.name: read_file_chunk
tools.description: Read a specific byte range from a file

tools.name: read_file_tail
tools.description: Read the last N lines of a file

tools.name: read_file_head
tools.description: Read the first N lines of a file

tools.name: read_compressed_file
tools.description: Read and decompress a gzipped file

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file, creating if needed

tools.name: write_text_file
tools.description: Write text content to a file with encoding

tools.name: write_binary_file
tools.description: Write binary data to a file

tools.name: write_json_file
tools.description: Write object as formatted JSON to file

tools.name: write_yaml_file
tools.description: Write object as YAML to configuration file

tools.name: write_csv_file
tools.description: Write structured data to CSV file

tools.name: write_log_entry
tools.description: Append a log entry to a log file

tools.name: append_to_file
tools.description: Append content to the end of a file

tools.name: overwrite_file
tools.description: Overwrite entire file with new content

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create a new empty file at path

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file from the filesystem

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move a file to a new location

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Copy a file to a new location

tools.name: rename_file
tools.description: Rename a file in the same directory

tools.name: file_exists
tools.description: Check if a file exists at the path

tools.name: file_permissions
tools.description: Get or set file permission bits

tools.name: file_diff
tools.description: Compare two files and show differences

tools.name: file_split
tools.description: Split a large file into smaller chunks

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and folders in directory

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List only files in a directory

tools.name: find_files_by_date
tools.description: Find files modified within date range

tools.name: move_directory
tools.description: Move a directory to new location

tools.name: backup_file
tools.description: Create a backup copy of file

tools.name: send_slack_message
tools.description: Send a message to a Slack channel

tools.name: send_slack_dm
tools.description: Send a direct message to a Slack user

tools.name: send_slack_thread_reply
tools.description: Reply to a message in a Slack thread

tools.name: send_slack_alert
tools.description: Send an urgent alert to Slack channel

tools.name: send_slack_reminder
tools.description: Schedule a reminder message in Slack

tools.name: post_slack_message
tools.description: Post a formatted message to Slack

tools.name: slack_send_file
tools.description: Upload and share a file in Slack

tools.name: slack_send_image
tools.description: Share an image in Slack channel

tools.name: slack_send_code_snippet
tools.description: Share a code snippet in Slack

tools.name: slack_react_to_message
tools.description: Add emoji reaction to Slack message

tools.name: slack_pin_message
tools.description: Pin an important message in channel

tools.name: slack_list_users
tools.description: List all users in Slack workspace

tools.name: send_text_message
tools.description: Send a text message to phone

tools.name: jira_create_bug
tools.description: Create a bug report in Jira

tools.name: jira_create_story
tools.description: Create a user story in Jira
